name: register
description: Register for a new account number

options.name: phone_number
options.description: The 10 digit US phone number to call when the system is triggered

name: verify
description: Verify the phone number on a new account

options.name: verification_code
options.description: The 6 digit verification code sent to the phone number

name: update
description: Update the phone number on an account

options.name: phone_number
options.description: The 10 digit US phone number to call when the system is triggered

name: cancel
description: Cancel verification and account number creation if you have one in-progress

name: link
description: Link two account numbers together so someone else can get calls for your account number too

options.name: from
options.description: Account number to receive alerts from

options.name: to
options.description: Account number to forward alerts to

options.description: Account number to receive alerts from

name: links
